attributes.action: Stop attempts by Royal Mail Plc of closing the final salary pension to new members together with present staff having to pay more in contributions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government and the Post Office have enjoyed benefits and monies for 13years whilst the business took a payment holiday. Now Royal Mail are looking into exploring an increase in members contributions together with possibly expecting them to work longer. Current and existing members of the scheme have worked hard for their pensions, the deserve better!!!
